What I'm Working On

Projects I'm in the middle of.

  • ETA: March 2016

    Diverse Building

    Company site built to display building experience in Agriculture, Commercial, and Residential.

    Requirements: Online quote form and image gallery
    CMS: Joomla!

  • ETA: March 2016

    Bay Pharmaceuticals

    Pharmaceutical sales company required customer login in phase 1 of project and will be adding ecommerce solution in phase 2.

    Requirements: Customer login with order history page viewable only by customer.
    CMS: Joomla!

  • ETA: March 2016

    Revertech

    Corporate high level marketing site.

    Requirements: Responsive site with emphasis on content and SEO.
    CMS: Wordpress

  • May 2016

    Deskins Concrete

    Construction site focused on displaying their small to large scall craftsmanship in the concrete and curbing industry. Joomla! CMS

    Requirements: Responsive site with image gallery.
    CMS: Joomla!
